thread.title: USC AD Pat Haden explains firing of Steve Sarkisian
thread.title_full: USC AD Pat Haden explains firing of Steve Sarkisian - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Associated Press
title: USC AD Pat Haden explains firing of Steve Sarkisian
text: USC athletic director Pat Haden defended both his hiring and firing of Steve Sarkisian on Tuesday, saying the troubled head coach passed a thorough background check and had no behavioral missteps until the past two months.
